info.name: Ultron
info.description:
# Ultron ‚Äî Market/SEO/Ads Intelligence Agent API

Ultron is an AI-powered agent designed for marketplace sellers operating on **Mercado Livre** and **Magalu**. It provides a unified API surface for market research, SEO optimization, ad campaign management, document intelligence, report generation, and real-time product monitoring.

---

## Getting Started

All requests require a Bearer token. Set the following collection variables before making any calls:

| Variable | Description | Example |
|---|---|---|
| `base_url` | Base URL of your Ultron API instance | `https://api.ultron.io` |
| `api_token` | Your API authentication token | `eyJhbGci...` |
| `marketplace` | Target marketplace | `mercadolivre` or `magalu` |

---

## Collection Structure

### üîç Market Research
Search products, retrieve competitor pricing, analyze category trends, and run the full AI-powered market research agent. Supports both Mercado Livre and Magalu marketplaces.

### üìà SEO Analysis
Get keyword suggestions, analyze and score product listings, optimize product titles, check keyword rankings, and run competitor keyword analysis to improve organic visibility.

### üì£ Ads Analysis
List and monitor ad campaigns, retrieve granular performance metrics (impressions, clicks, CTR, ROAS), and get AI-powered optimization recommendations.

### üìÑ PDF & Document Reading
Upload PDFs (catalogs, competitor reports, invoices) and use AI to extract structured data ‚Äî pricing tables, product lists, and market statistics ‚Äî from unstructured documents.

### üìä Report Generation
Generate comprehensive market intelligence reports combining research, SEO, and ads data. Reports can be exported as PDF or JSON and downloaded asynchronously.

### üöÄ Ad Creation
Create individual or bulk ad campaigns with AI-assisted keyword targeting and bid optimization. Supports auto and manual bid strategies.

### üîî Monitoring & Alerts
Set up real-time alerts for price drops, ranking changes, and competitor activity. Review historical monitoring events to track product performance over time.

---

## Authentication

All endpoints use **Bearer Token** authentication. Set `{{api_token}}` in your environment or collection variables.

```
Authorization: Bearer {{api_token}}
```

---

## Common Variables

- `{{product_id}}` ‚Äî Marketplace product identifier
- `{{campaign_id}}` ‚Äî Ad campaign identifier
- `{{document_id}}` ‚Äî Uploaded document identifier
- `{{report_id}}` ‚Äî Generated report identifier
- `{{category}}` ‚Äî Product category slug
- `{{start_date}}` / `{{end_date}}` ‚Äî Date range in `YYYY-MM-DD` format
- `{{period}}` ‚Äî Time period (e.g., `7d`, `30d`, `90d`)

request.description: Search for products on Mercado Livre marketplace. Returns a list of products matching the query with pricing, seller info, and ranking data.
Search for products on Magazine Luiza (Magalu) marketplace. Returns a list of products matching the query with pricing, seller info, and ranking data.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific product including price history, reviews, seller reputation, and stock availability.
Analyze competitor pricing for a set of products across marketplaces. Returns min, max, and average prices along with seller details.
Retrieve trending products and categories for a given marketplace and time period. Useful for identifying market opportunities.
Trigger the AI-powered market research agent to perform a comprehensive analysis across marketplaces. Returns insights on competition, pricing, and market positioning.
Retrieve high-performing SEO keywords for a product title and category on a given marketplace. Returns keyword suggestions ranked by search volume and competition score.
Analyze the SEO quality of an existing product listing. Returns a score, keyword density, title optimization tips, and description improvement suggestions.
Use the AI agent to generate an optimized product title for a given marketplace. Returns multiple title variants ranked by predicted SEO performance.
Check the current organic search ranking position of a product for a specific keyword on a marketplace. Returns position, page, and historical ranking trend.
Extract and analyze the keywords used by top-ranking competitor listings. Returns a keyword gap analysis to identify opportunities your listings are missing.
List all active and paused ad campaigns for a given marketplace. Returns campaign ID, name, budget, spend, impressions, clicks, and ROAS.
Retrieve detailed performance metrics for a specific ad campaign including impressions, clicks, CTR, spend, conversions, and ROAS over a date range.
Update an existing ad campaign's budget, status (active/paused), bid strategy, or target keywords. Use this to optimize campaigns based on performance data.
Get AI-powered ad optimization recommendations for a product, including suggested bid adjustments, keyword additions/removals, and budget reallocation strategies.
Upload a PDF or document file for AI-powered content extraction. Supports invoices, product catalogs, competitor reports, and market research PDFs.
Extract structured data from a previously uploaded document. Supports extracting product listings, pricing tables, competitor data, and market statistics from PDFs.
Run AI analysis on an uploaded document to extract competitive intelligence, pricing data, and market insights. Supports Portuguese and English documents.
Generate a comprehensive market intelligence report combining market research, SEO analysis, and ads performance data. Returns a downloadable PDF or JSON report.
Check the generation status of a previously requested report. Returns status (pending/processing/completed/failed) and a download URL when ready.
Download a completed market report in the requested format (PDF or JSON). The report includes market overview, competitor analysis, SEO insights, and ads performance data.
Create a new sponsored product ad campaign on a marketplace. The AI agent automatically suggests optimal keywords and bid values based on market data.
Create multiple ad campaigns in a single request. The AI agent can auto-optimize bids and keywords for each product based on market research data.
Create a monitoring alert for a product. Triggers notifications when price drops, ranking changes, or competitor activity is detected on the marketplace.
List all configured monitoring alerts for products. Filter by marketplace, alert status (active/triggered/paused), or specific product ID.
Retrieve a history of monitoring events for a product, including price changes, ranking shifts, competitor activity, and stock availability changes.
